plot: It goes like this: a man opens the door. Some guests go in and find a huge animal inside. The man asks everyone to feel at home. And everyone pretends not to see the Elephant in the Room.
title: Elefante na Sala
plot_es: It goes like this: a man opens the door. Some guests go in and find a huge animal inside. The man asks everyone to feel at home. And everyone pretends not to see the Elephant in the Room.
plot_en: It goes like this: a man opens the door. Some guests go in and find a huge animal inside. The man asks everyone to feel at home. And everyone pretends not to see the Elephant in the Room.
